title: Drawing, "Chart for Clay Base Forms", ca. 1955–65
medium: Pen and black ink, pink goauche (?), graphite on cardboard
signed: Lower center in black ink: Elsa Freund
inscribed:
Inscribed and annotated throughout in black ink with various customer names, object types, and shapes.
Verso in black ink on white paper (attached with tape to cardboard support): "Bob / These cardboard charts are for / clay base forms I made (and actually / placing clay on drawn shapes / allowing for shrinkage of course) for / customers (their names on pieces- / with the holes for the silver indicated) / * So these are clay marked working charts (sometimes with silver wire / movements indicated) Elsa"

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Chart for Clay Base Forms", ca. 1955–65. Pen and black ink, pink goauche (?), graphite on cardboard. Gift of Elsa Freund. 1992-107-5.
